productName: Zero-Cost Remote Job Search Automation System
executiveSummary: An intelligent, locally-hosted automation system that discovers remote jobs across multiple platforms, provides AI-powered matching and gap analysis, generates tailored application materials, and tracks the full application lifecycle. Zero infrastructure cost with privacy-first architecture.
problemStatement: Remote job seekers waste 15-20 hours/week manually searching across fragmented platforms, resulting in 80% of relevant jobs being missed, 2-5% response rates from generic applications, and 30% of applications lost due to poor tracking. Cloud solutions cost $136/month, making them inaccessible for cost-conscious seekers.
targetUsers: Remote job seekers (software developers, tech professionals)
Career changers looking for remote opportunities
International candidates targeting US/UK/EU remote jobs
inScope: Automated job scraping from 5+ platforms (RemoteOK, WeWorkRemotely, Himalayas, Indeed, LinkedIn)
LinkedIn stealth scraping with human-like behavior (20-40 jobs/day)
LinkedIn email alert parsing as zero-risk backup
AI-powered job-candidate matching with skill gap analysis
Cover letter and CV generation using hybrid AI (Ollama + Claude)
Full application lifecycle tracking with Kanban board
Error handling with circuit breakers and retry logic
outOfScope: Recruiter marketplace or job board creation

objectives.description: Reduce job search time from 15 hours/week to 3 hours/week (80% reduction)
objectives.metric: Time spent on job search activities

objectives.description: Increase job discovery from 50 jobs/week to 200+ jobs/week
Improve application response rate from 2-5% to 10%+
Maintain zero infrastructure cost with <$5/month AI API budget

constraints.impact: Limits LLM model size to 7B quantized

constraints.description: LinkedIn aggressively blocks automated scrapers using fingerprinting and behavioral analysis
constraints.impact: Requires stealth automation with human-like behavior patterns, session persistence, and conservative rate limits (20-40 jobs/day)
Must use free local LLMs for most tasks

constraints.description: Must respect job board Terms of Service
All user data must stay local
constraints.impact: No cloud storage; local PostgreSQL only

requirements.title: Multi-Platform Job Scraping
requirements.description: System shall automatically scrape job listings from multiple platforms (RemoteOK, WeWorkRemotely, Himalayas, Indeed) on a daily schedule, handling rate limits gracefully with circuit breakers and exponential backoff.
requirements.rationale: Core value proposition - automated job discovery eliminates manual searching

requirements.title: Job Data Extraction
requirements.description: System shall extract structured data from job listings including: job title, company name, location, salary (if available), full description, required technologies, posted date, and application URL.
requirements.rationale: Structured data enables filtering, matching, and analytics

requirements.title: Job Deduplication
requirements.description: System shall identify and remove duplicate job listings across platforms using title+company matching (case-insensitive), keeping the version with the most complete data.
requirements.rationale: Prevents user confusion and wasted effort on duplicate applications

requirements.title: Job Normalization
requirements.description: System shall normalize extracted job data including: country name standardization, technology name mapping (React.js → React), salary conversion to USD, and experience level categorization.
requirements.rationale: Normalized data enables accurate filtering and comparison

requirements.title: Job Filtering
requirements.description: System shall filter jobs based on user preferences: target countries (OR logic), technologies (must match ≥1), salary range (min/max), remote-only toggle, and experience level.
requirements.rationale: Filtering reduces noise and surfaces relevant opportunities

requirements.title: CV Upload and Parsing
requirements.description: System shall accept CV uploads in PDF and DOCX formats (max 5MB), extract full text with 95%+ accuracy, and identify technical skills, experience duration, and education.
requirements.rationale: CV data is foundational for matching and content generation

requirements.title: User Profile Management
requirements.description: System shall allow users to configure job search preferences including: target countries, preferred technologies, salary expectations, experience level, and remote-only preference.
requirements.rationale: Profile enables personalized job discovery and matching

requirements.title: Hybrid Match Scoring
requirements.description: System shall calculate a match score (0-100%) for each job using a hybrid approach: 30% TF-IDF text similarity, 40% skill overlap, 20% experience match, 10% semantic embeddings.
requirements.rationale: Hybrid approach balances keyword matching with semantic understanding

requirements.title: Skill Gap Analysis
requirements.description: System shall analyze each job to identify: matched skills (in CV AND job), missing skills (in job NOT in CV), and extra skills (in CV NOT in job), with fuzzy matching for synonyms.
requirements.rationale: Gap analysis provides actionable insights for skill development

requirements.title: AI-Powered Gap Analysis Report
requirements.description: System shall use local LLM (Ollama) to generate detailed gap analysis including: strengths (3-5 points), missing skills (3-5 points), improvement suggestions (3-5 actionable items), and overall assessment.
requirements.rationale: AI analysis provides deeper insights than algorithmic matching alone

requirements.title: Cover Letter Generation
requirements.description: System shall generate 3 cover letter variants using local LLM (Ollama): Conservative (professional, formal), Aggressive (bold, confident), and Story-driven (narrative alignment). Each 300-400 words.
requirements.rationale: Multiple variants give users choice based on company culture

requirements.title: Cover Letter Polish (Optional)
requirements.description: System shall optionally polish cover letters using Claude API for high-match jobs (≥85%) or on user request, improving grammar, clarity, and tone.
requirements.rationale: API polish improves quality for high-value applications

requirements.title: CV Tailoring
requirements.description: System shall generate tailored CV versions that reorder bullet points by relevance to the job, add a 'Key Skills Match' section, and highlight matching technologies.
requirements.rationale: Tailored CVs improve ATS compatibility and recruiter attention

requirements.title: Hybrid AI Cost Management
requirements.description: System shall track AI usage (Ollama: unlimited, Claude: budget-limited) and alert users when approaching the monthly budget ($10), defaulting to Ollama-only when budget exceeded.
requirements.rationale: Cost control ensures sustainability of the zero-cost model

requirements.title: Application Status Management
requirements.description: System shall track application lifecycle with statuses: Saved, Reviewing, Applied, Interviewing, Rejected, Offered. Status changes must record timestamps and can only move forward (except Rejected from any).
requirements.rationale: Status tracking prevents lost applications and enables follow-ups

requirements.title: Application Notes
requirements.description: System shall allow users to add freeform notes to each application with rich text formatting and auto-save functionality.
requirements.rationale: Notes capture context for interviews and follow-ups

requirements.title: Follow-Up Reminders
requirements.description: System shall automatically send email reminders 7 days after 'Applied' status, with options to snooze (3/7/14 days) or dismiss. Reminders cancelled if status changes to Interviewing/Rejected.
requirements.rationale: Automated reminders improve follow-up rates and response rates

requirements.title: Application Timeline Visualization
requirements.description: System shall display a horizontal timeline for each application showing progression through stages with calculated durations and comparison to averages.
requirements.rationale: Timeline visualization helps identify slow-moving applications

requirements.title: Job List Dashboard
requirements.description: System shall display discovered jobs in a card layout with match score, technologies, salary, and quick actions. Support sorting by match %, date, salary and filtering by multiple criteria.
requirements.rationale: Dashboard is the primary user interface for job discovery

requirements.title: Job Detail View
requirements.description: System shall display comprehensive job information including full description, requirements checklist (matched/missing), gap analysis, cover letter variants, and tailored CV preview.
requirements.rationale: Detail view enables informed application decisions

requirements.title: Kanban Application Board
requirements.description: System shall provide a Kanban-style board with columns for each application status, supporting drag-and-drop status changes and showing card count per column.
requirements.rationale: Kanban provides intuitive application pipeline management

requirements.title: Analytics Dashboard
requirements.description: System shall display analytics including application funnel chart, conversion rates, source performance comparison, match score distribution, and weekly activity trends.
requirements.rationale: Analytics enable data-driven job search optimization

requirements.title: Daily Job Digest Email
requirements.description: System shall send daily email at 9:00 AM containing top 10 new high-match jobs (≥70%) with titles, companies, match scores, and dashboard links. Skip if no matches.
requirements.rationale: Daily digest drives engagement without requiring login

requirements.title: Weekly Analytics Report
requirements.description: System shall send weekly email summary including jobs discovered, applications submitted, interviews scheduled, conversion rates, and trending technologies.
requirements.rationale: Weekly reports provide progress visibility and motivation

requirements.title: Daily Automated Scraping
requirements.description: System shall execute automated scraping workflow daily at 8:00 AM via n8n, completing within 60 minutes, with automatic retry on failure and email alert if zero jobs scraped.
requirements.rationale: Scheduled automation ensures consistent job discovery

requirements.title: Automated Match Scoring
requirements.description: System shall automatically calculate match scores for all new jobs after daily scraping completes, processing in batches of 10 to prevent resource overload.
requirements.rationale: Automated scoring enables immediate filtering and ranking

requirements.title: Circuit Breaker Pattern
requirements.description: System shall implement circuit breakers for each scraper: 3 consecutive failures trigger 1-hour cooldown, health check before scraping, and graceful degradation when platform unavailable.
requirements.rationale: Circuit breakers prevent cascade failures and resource waste

requirements.title: Retry Logic with Backoff
requirements.description: System shall implement retry logic with exponential backoff (1s, 2s, 4s, 8s, max 30s) for transient failures, with configurable max retry count (default: 3).
requirements.rationale: Retry logic handles transient network/API failures gracefully

requirements.title: Health Check Endpoints
requirements.description: System shall expose health check endpoints for all services: scraper API (/health), PostgreSQL (connection test), Ollama (model availability), n8n (workflow status).
requirements.rationale: Health checks enable monitoring and alerting

requirements.title: Centralized Error Logging
requirements.description: System shall log all errors with structured JSON format including timestamp, service, severity, message, and context. Logs rotated daily, retained 30 days.
requirements.rationale: Centralized logging enables debugging and incident response

requirements.title: Automated Database Backup
requirements.description: System shall perform daily database backup at 2:00 AM, storing compressed backups locally with 7-day retention and automated restore testing monthly.
requirements.rationale: Backups protect against data loss from corruption or user error

requirements.title: Data Retention Policy
requirements.description: System shall automatically clean up: unsaved jobs after 90 days, generated content after 30 days, raw analytics after 6 months (aggregated data retained).
requirements.rationale: Data retention prevents unbounded database growth

requirements.title: Docker Containerization
requirements.description: System shall be deployable via Docker Compose with containers for: scraper API, PostgreSQL, Ollama, n8n, and web frontend. Single docker-compose up command to start.
requirements.rationale: Docker ensures reproducible deployment across environments

requirements.title: Performance: Scraping Completion
requirements.description: System shall complete daily scraping of all platforms within 60 minutes, with individual platform timeout of 15 minutes.
requirements.rationale: Timely scraping ensures fresh job data for users

requirements.title: Performance: Match Scoring
requirements.description: System shall calculate match scores within 10 seconds per job, with batch processing completing 300 jobs within 50 minutes.
requirements.rationale: Efficient scoring enables real-time filtering

requirements.title: Performance: Content Generation
requirements.description: System shall generate cover letter variants within 90 seconds per variant using Ollama on 8GB RAM minimum configuration.
requirements.rationale: Reasonable generation time maintains user engagement

requirements.title: Performance: Dashboard Load
requirements.description: System shall load job list dashboard within 2 seconds for up to 1000 jobs, with pagination/infinite scroll for larger datasets.
requirements.rationale: Fast dashboard improves user experience and productivity

requirements.title: Security: Local Data Only
requirements.description: System shall store all user data (CV, preferences, applications) locally in PostgreSQL with no external transmission except optional Claude API calls.
requirements.rationale: Privacy-first architecture protects sensitive job search data

requirements.title: Security: API Key Management
requirements.description: System shall store API keys (Anthropic, email) in environment variables, never in code or logs. Provide .env.example with documentation.
requirements.rationale: Secure key management prevents credential leakage

requirements.title: Usability: Single-User Setup
requirements.description: System shall support single-user deployment with one-time profile setup, no authentication required for local access.
requirements.rationale: Simple setup reduces friction for personal use

requirements.title: LinkedIn Stealth Job Scraping
requirements.description: System shall scrape LinkedIn job listings using Playwright with stealth plugins (playwright-extra, stealth plugin) in headed browser mode, extracting 20-40 jobs per daily session with human-like behavior patterns.
requirements.rationale: LinkedIn is the primary job platform for remote tech positions; stealth approach prevents detection

requirements.title: LinkedIn Session Management
requirements.description: System shall maintain persistent browser sessions with cookie storage, localStorage preservation, and session resumption to avoid repeated logins. Sessions stored locally with 7-day rotation.
requirements.rationale: Session persistence mimics real user behavior and reduces detection risk from frequent logins

requirements.title: LinkedIn Human-Like Behavior
requirements.description: System shall implement human-like interaction patterns including: Gamma distribution timing (8s ± 4s between actions), variable session lengths (15-25 minutes), mouse movement simulation, scroll behavior variation, and operation during business hours only (9 AM - 6 PM local time).
requirements.rationale: Human-like patterns evade LinkedIn's behavioral fingerprinting detection systems

requirements.title: LinkedIn Detection Monitoring
requirements.description: System shall monitor for detection signals (CAPTCHA challenges, rate limit responses, unusual redirects, account warnings) and automatically pause scraping for 24-48 hours when detected, with exponential backoff on repeated triggers.
requirements.rationale: Early detection response prevents account bans and maintains long-term access

requirements.title: LinkedIn Browser Fingerprint Injection
requirements.description: System shall inject realistic browser fingerprints using fingerprint-generator library including: Canvas fingerprint randomization, WebGL renderer variation, font enumeration masking, and timezone/language consistency with user profile.
requirements.rationale: Fingerprint injection prevents canvas/WebGL-based bot detection

requirements.title: LinkedIn Email Alert Integration
requirements.description: System shall parse LinkedIn job alert emails as zero-risk backup source, extracting job URLs, titles, companies, and posting dates from email content using IMAP integration.
requirements.rationale: Email parsing provides risk-free LinkedIn job discovery when stealth scraping is paused

requirements.title: LinkedIn Manual URL Import
requirements.description: System shall accept manual LinkedIn job URL imports as fallback, fetching full job details from provided URLs with rate-limited requests (1 request per 30 seconds).
requirements.rationale: Manual import provides guaranteed access when automation is unavailable

requirements.title: Cloud Backup Sync
requirements.description: System shall automatically sync encrypted database backups to Google Drive (or configurable cloud provider) using rclone after each daily backup, with 90-day retention in cloud storage.
requirements.rationale: Cloud backup provides offsite disaster recovery while maintaining zero infrastructure cost using free tier storage

requirements.title: Docker Volume Persistence
requirements.description: System shall use named Docker volumes for all persistent data (PostgreSQL, backups, LinkedIn sessions, user uploads) with explicit volume mounts to prevent data loss on container recreation. Volumes must survive docker-compose down and container updates.
requirements.rationale: Named volumes ensure data survives container lifecycle events, preventing accidental data loss

requirements.title: Complete Docker Environment Backup
requirements.description: System shall provide comprehensive backup capability for the entire Docker environment including: all named volumes (database, sessions, uploads, backups), custom-built images, container configurations, docker-compose files, and network configurations. Backup shall be exportable to external storage.
requirements.rationale: Complete environment backup enables full recovery after Docker Desktop reinstallation or machine migration

requirements.title: One-Click Backup and Restore Scripts
requirements.description: System shall provide automated shell scripts for: (1) backup-docker.sh - creates timestamped backup of all Docker data, (2) restore-docker.sh - restores from backup after fresh Docker install. Scripts must be executable without additional dependencies and include progress indicators.
requirements.rationale: Automated scripts reduce human error and enable non-technical users to perform disaster recovery

requirements.title: Backup Integrity Verification
requirements.description: System shall verify backup integrity after creation by: checking archive checksums, validating tar.gz file integrity, generating manifest with file counts and sizes, and optionally performing test restore to temporary location.
requirements.rationale: Verification ensures backups are complete and restorable before relying on them for disaster recovery

requirements.title: Pre-Uninstall Backup Checklist
requirements.description: System shall provide interactive pre-uninstall checklist that: verifies latest backup exists and is recent (<24h), confirms backup copied to external storage, lists all volumes and their backup status, requires explicit confirmation before proceeding.
requirements.rationale: Pre-uninstall checklist prevents accidental data loss due to forgotten or outdated backups

requirements.title: Backup Documentation and Recovery Guide
requirements.description: System shall include comprehensive documentation covering: backup file structure (MANIFEST.md), step-by-step recovery instructions (RESTORE.md), troubleshooting common issues, and estimated recovery time for each component.
requirements.rationale: Clear documentation enables successful recovery even under stress during actual disaster scenarios

requirements.title: n8n Automated Backup Workflow
requirements.description: System shall provide an n8n workflow for automated daily Docker backups that: executes at 2:00 AM daily, backs up all volumes and custom images, syncs to Google Drive via rclone, sends email notifications on success/failure, and cleans up old backups (retains 7 local, 5 cloud).
requirements.rationale: Automated scheduled backups ensure data protection without manual intervention while Docker is running

requirements.title: Backup Notification System
requirements.description: System shall send email notifications for backup events including: successful backup with summary (volumes, images, size), failed backup with error details, cloud sync status, and weekly backup health report.
requirements.rationale: Notifications ensure administrators are aware of backup status without manual checking

requirements.title: Backup Retention Policy Automation
requirements.description: System shall automatically enforce backup retention policies: local backups retained for 7 days, cloud backups retained for 90 days, cleanup runs after each successful backup, and manual backups exempt from auto-cleanup.
requirements.rationale: Automated retention prevents storage exhaustion while maintaining adequate recovery points

glossary.TF-IDF: Term Frequency-Inverse Document Frequency - a text similarity algorithm
glossary.Ollama: Open-source local LLM runtime for running models like Mistral and Llama
glossary.n8n: Open-source workflow automation tool similar to Zapier
glossary.Circuit Breaker: Design pattern that prevents cascading failures by stopping requests to failing services
glossary.ATS: Applicant Tracking System - software used by companies to manage job applications
glossary.Kanban: Visual project management method using cards and columns
glossary.Stealth Plugin: Browser automation extension that masks bot fingerprints to avoid detection
glossary.Browser Fingerprinting: Technique to identify browsers using canvas, WebGL, fonts, and other browser characteristics
glossary.Gamma Distribution: Statistical distribution used to model human-like variable timing between actions
glossary.Session Persistence: Maintaining browser state (cookies, localStorage) across automation sessions
